text: @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/OofexBG1Cz  Travelers Greeted With Hours-Long Airport Lines As Coronavirus Screenings Begin. Trump lied again. The administration never prepared for this either, hence the overly long delays with thousands in tight spaces.
